root: ^Welcome to your new humble abode. This is where we start our lives together.
^Oh my stars, it certainly is… a place.
^I know, right?! It’s just you, me, and all the trash we can eat.
^…You hate it a dung ton, don’t you?
^I just hate that there ain’t a stream to wash food in!
^And that there’ll be humans marchin’ about, waitin’ for a chance to eat us!
^Hey now, I know city life is different from your old home out in the country, but just give it a chance.
^Give humans a chance too. I’ve never seen one eat a raccoon before. A pigeon, sure, but us? Never.
^Come on, I’ll show you the ropes, then I have a surprise for you!
